General.Name: Equity LifeStyle Properties Inc
General.Description: We are a self-administered, self-managed real estate investment trust ("REIT") with headquarters in Chicago. As of July 17, 2023, we own or have an interest in 450 properties in 35 states and British Columbia consisting of 171,706 sites.
General.Address: Two North Riverside Plaza, Chicago, IL, United States, 60606
